        Parameters:
        value - - the Value of the card - 2-14 (2 through Ace)
        suit - - a Suit enumeration
        isVisible - - a boolean to set the default state of the PlayingCard (face down or face-up
        inImage - - an ImageView of the image assigned to the PlayingCard

        public boolean compareSuit(PlayingCard inCard)
        compareSuit() - returns if this cards suit is equal to the provided cards suit.
        Parameters:
        inCard - - the provided card
        Returns:
        boolean, true if they are the same, false if they are not

      • compareColor

        public boolean compareColor(PlayingCard inCard)
        compareColor() - compares the Color (Generally Red and Black) of two PlayingCard Objects. Spades/Clubs are considered 1 color, Hearts and Diamonds are considered the other. Any combination of those colors, will return true, opposite colors will return false;
        Parameters:
        inCard - the PlayingCard that you wish to compare the color with
        Returns:
        boolean, true if they are the same color, false if they are not

      • getImage

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImage()
        getImage() returns the ImageView assigned to this PlayingCard object
        Returns:
        ImageView, the image assigned to this PlayingCard

        show() sets this cards visibility to true

      • flip

        public void flip()
        flip() sets this cards visibility to the opposite of it's current state

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility(boolean visibility)
        setVisibility() manually sets the visibility
        Parameters:
        visibility - boolean value, the desired visibility, true is shown, false is face down
